title: Fall premiere dates for returning shows, including ‘The Crown,’ ‘Mrs. Maisel’ and ‘This Is Us’
text: There’s plenty to love on this list of fall’s returning shows — I’ve already seen an episode of Olivia Colman’s takeover as Queen Elizabeth II in Netflix’s “The Crown” and, as expected, she’s perfect for the part. Elsewhere, a number of notable favorites are kicking off their final seasons, including “The Good Place,” “The Deuce,” “Empire,” “Madam Secretary,” “Mr. Robot,” “Silicon Valley” and CW’s stalwart “Supernatural.” I’ve placed an asterisk* by some recommendations to help you prioritize. Good luck with that.
description: The season brings many farewells — “The Good Place,” “Supernatural” and “Silicon Valley” among them.
